title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 353.4 - Medical board
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 353.4 - Medical board

State Regulations

The determining authority may consult the medical board
established pursuant to section
74
of the Retirement and Social Security Law
with respect to any application where it determines that the advice of the
medical board would be appropriate or beneficial. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
353.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
